```{julia}
#| label: load-modules

using Plots

include("src/generalized_born_model.jl")
using .GeneralizedBornModel
```

## Initialize the model

```{julia}
#| label: build-model-attempt-2
#| include: true
#| eval: true

radius = 5.0
row_and_col_count = 20
size_x = 500.0
size_y = 500.0

model = init_model(radius, row_and_col_count, size_x, size_y);
```

## Plot the collection of circles

### Attempt 2

```{julia}
#| label: plot-model-attempt-2
#| include: true
#| eval: true

centers_x = model[:grid][:, 1]
centers_y = model[:grid][:, 2]

scatter(centers_x, centers_y, markersize=radius, markercolor=:orange, markerstrokecolor=:black)
```
